title: hmcl崩溃，求助
author: qw514382954
txt_content:

replies.author: 轩辕Shi
replies.txt_content:
应该是没有装api，fabric不像forge，api是要手动装载的
教程:https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=863949
在这里下载fabric api：https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/fabric-api

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
装了api吗



fabric-api-0.4.29+build.290-1.15.jar
(497.09 KB, 下载次数: 1)



2020-7-14 10:12 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: mc_cai_niao
replies.txt_content: 下载forge版本就ok了，地图mod不会变的
